item.title: Comparing Relative Typing Difficulties Across Languages Using Corpora
item.description:
###References

  • Boerger, Brenda H. (2007). Natqgu Literacy: Capturing Three Domains for Written Language Use. Language Documentation & Conservation 1(2), 126–153.
  • Cooper, Gregory. (2005). Issues in the Development of a Writing System for the Kalasha Language. Sydney, Australia: Macquarie University dissertation.
  • Feit, Anna Maria, Daryl Weir, and Antti Oulasvirta. (2016). How We Type: Movement Strategies and Performance in Everyday Typing. In Proceedings of the 2016 CHI Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems, 4262–73. San Jose California USA: ACM.
  • Guérin, Valérie. (2008). Writing an endangered language. Language Documentation & Conservation 2(1), 47–67.
  • Jany, Carmen. (2010). Orthography Design for Chuxnabán Mixe. Language Documentation & Conservation 4(1), 231–53.
